Interface ReflectionUtil

The use of this code without GSA team authorization will be a violation of terms of use determined in here

  • Method Details

    • tryBroadcast

      static void tryBroadcast​(@NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String message)
      Try to broadcast a message into bukkit, if fail, it will try it in bungeecord
      Parameters:
      message - the message

    • tryBroadcast

      static void tryBroadcast​(@NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String message, @NotNull @NotNull java.lang.Object... replaces)
      Try to broadcast a message into bukkit, if fail, it will try it in bungeecord, the message will be replaced with the replaces in each placeholder "{0}, {1}, {2}"
      Parameters:
      message - the message
      replaces - the message replaces

      info - the log info
